projects.name: devC
projects.shortInfo: A linux command line utility to build 'python venv' like reusable virtualenv from Dockerfile/Containerfile or directly from a container image. Virtualenv for containers!

projects.name: STMP
projects.shortInfo: STMP: Sitty Talky Messaging Protocol : A primitive zero-configuration local network protocol purely written in python, originally intended for tinkering with your office mates over LAN!
